visualobjects

Class ContentBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • visualobjects.VisualObject<T>
      • visualobjects.ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<LogicalVoid>
        • visualobjects.ContentBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FormContainer<FormWrapper>, AsciiTypable, FunctionTypable, Typable, DeleteListener, DeleteSubject, UpdateListener, UpdateSubject

    public class ContentBox
extends ResizableAndMovableVisualObject<LogicalVoid>
implements FormContainer<FormWrapper>
    Box that contains CanvasContent, can be resized and moved.
